segments.text: Yes , I am wondering if I can join the sightseeing tour in your hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . How many people are there in your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I will arrange it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Put the charge on my bills , please .
segments.speaker: S2
